body: I thought this would be a jjk hentai. I thought the code that shows fucking jjk characters would bring me to a jjk hentai

Here's the English scanlation 

https://hentaitranscripts.blogspot.com/2021/04/my-harem-academiaenglish-scanlation.html

 hope they upload it into nhentai.

https://hentaitranscripts.blogspot.com/2021/04/353882.html this is the english translation done by me (only transcript not scanlation) feel free to use it if you can't wait for scanlation ( no one knows when that will happen) or if you want to scanlate it(like running short of translators.).After watching the new episode of MHA I found this doujinshi with good art but no english version yet so I did it.
